metadata.description: Some people -- and you know who we mean -- were saying that we couldn't possibly go more classic with our tale of the Tremendous Trump.  It's all fake news, so sad.  We are bringing you the biggest, most beautiful retro-fied edition of the Tangerine Titan's premiere adventure, in all it's yellowed, off-register glory, now with bonus retro ads and sketches!  We're doing the right thing, and it's not good for us, believe -- okay, it IS good for us, but it's great for you too!  Orange you glad we did it?
metadata.name: The Tremendous Trump
